column3: Three, three bodies in the whole facility. This smells more than weird,

column1: and it's not just the corpse, everything else, the walls, the floor, the columns,
those bugs have been in here for a long time.

column3: This one here is not wearing any identifying pin, but he is wearing the
There is a document in his inside pocket, completely torn and stained

column1: with blood. But you can read the name of the project. Empress.
